title: Bug 20846WIN32: 'Combo.indexOf' always returns 1 for empty string
description: Bug 20846WIN32: 'Combo.indexOf' always returns 1 for empty string This is a problem of both the ComboLBox and ListBox control of Windows.The implementation of 'List.indexOf' already shows a solution which will alsowork fine for the Combo. (Theorem: Every set of bugs has an accumulation point.)
